title: Endura GV500 gravel collection melds on & off-road tech in Reiver-ready riding kit
content:
Endura’s new GV500 Gravel Collection adds another category between the lines of their long-running MTB and Road cycling kit. The new gravel riding clothing benefits from happy-medium close fits that won’t flap on fast paved sections but look relaxed off-the-bike, a mix of natural & synthetic fabrics to keep you comfortable in changing weather, and […]
